Class MeleeWeapon

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.Weapon
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.meleeweapons.MeleeWeapon
public class MeleeWeapon extends Weapon
Represents a generic melee weapon that the user can add to their loadout.

  • Constructor Details

    • MeleeWeapon

      public MeleeWeapon(String weaponName, WeaponType weaponType, DamageType damageType, HashMap<Integer,Double> weaponDamageByLevel, int apCost, double attackSpeed, int criticalBonus)
      The constructor for a MeleeWeapon object.
      Parameters:
      weaponName - The name of the weapon. The user will be able to see the given value.
      weaponType - The type of weapon. This is used for various Modifier conditions.
      damageType - The damage type the weapon afflicts. This is used for various Modifier conditions.
      weaponDamageByLevel - A HashMap of the weapons level (Integer) and the base damage it provides (Double).
      apCost - The Integer value that it costs to use the weapon.
      attackSpeed - The Double value of the speed the weapon attacks at. Different weapons will have varying rate of fires.
      criticalBonus - The Integer value of the bonus to critical damage the weapon provides.Primarily used for VATS.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseDamage

      public double getBaseDamage(int weaponLevel)
      Description copied from class: Weapon
      Retrieves the Double value of the damage the weapon provides.
      Specified by:
      getBaseDamage in class Weapon
      Parameters:
      weaponLevel - The level used to retrieve the provided damage value by corresponding weaponDamageByLevel key.
      Returns:
      The weaponDamageByLevel corresponding damage value.
